data.prayer: Lord, please give the 7,887 believers in the state of Łódzkie the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that they might know you better.
data.verse: I keep asking that the God of our Lord Jesus Christ, the glorious Father, may give you the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that you may know him better.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Łódzkie, Poland
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, teach the church in the state of Łódzkie to increase their prayer for your kingdom to come.
data.verse: Now when Daniel learned that the decree had been published, he went home to his upstairs room where the windows opened toward Jerusalem. Three times a day he got down on his knees and prayed, giving thanks to his God...

data.section_summary: On average, 2 babies will be born in the next hour to families who might know about God culturally, but likely have no relationship with Jesus in Łódzkie, Poland.
data.prayer: Lord, make yourself real to these new families.
Father, please help good, online teachers get the gospel on YouTube and into the the state of Łódzkie.
data.verse: And this gospel of the kingdom will be preached in the whole world as a testimony to all nations, and then the end will come.

data.prayer: Jesus, help the local leaders in Łódzkie, Poland not be proud but humble, and willing to wash the feet of all they serve.
data.verse: “You call me ‘Teacher’ and ‘Lord,’ and rightly so, for that is what I am. Now that I, your Lord and Teacher, have washed your feet, you also should wash one another’s feet. I have set you an example that you should do as I have done for you.

data.prayer: Lord we ask you on behalf of the South Asian, general people. 2.0% are known to be believers. Oh God, please share with them the great gift of your son Jesus and your kingdom.
Spirit, reveal best practices for sharing the gospel in the state of Łódzkie.
Lord, stir the hearts of your people in the state of Łódzkie to agree with you and with one another in love.
data.verse: that all of them may be one, Father, just as you are in me and I am in you. May they also be in us so that the world may believe that you have sent me.

data.prayer: There are 2,541,800 people living in the state of Łódzkie. Only about 7,887 might be believers.
